text:
Welcome to Moth Ed!

Let ªs label a moth. To label the moth below, drag it into your workspace on the right.

You can access any section of the Elementary MothEd curriculum as editable and printable pages to put out for table groups; colorize; etc. Below are two types of additional "teacher only" green tiles. Some are activities you can drag to your right side workspace and publish for your students to access under their "Classwork" tab. Others provide additional resources for hands on activities or learning extensions.

tiles.title: Drag the label to where it belongs on the moth

text:
Groups in CLUE

In CLUE, everyone works in a group with up to four people. Your group number is your table number.

Groups are important in CLUE. You can learn from table-mates in your group and they can learn from you. Many features of CLUE are designed to help you share information and learn from others in your group and in your class.

You in CLUE

On the right is your workspace. To edit your workspace, you must first add a tile. You get a tile in your workspace by either

  • Dragging a tile from the content (left side) in CLUE into your workspace (video)
  • Dragging a new tile from the menu on the left of your workspace
  • Click a button on the menu to add a new tile to the bottom of your workspace

All tiles have a waffle (gray triangle with dots) in the upper right corner. To drag the tile, click the waffle and hold it down as you drag it to your workspace. As you drag the tile into the workspace, a blue line shows where the tile will go when you let go.

OK, get ready... Here we go!

Watch your teacher as we model, model, model.

Discuss Moths with your Group

First, check that all the members of your group have the same group number at the top right of your screen.

Talk about moths with your group. Size, Color, Location, Quantity Found, Weather, Time, A-Ha's

What do you know about moths? Make a sketch by clicking open a Sketch Tile (pencil icon) on the toolbar or write a list of what your group knows using a Text Tile by clicking on the A icon.

Watch this Moth video

Brainstorm some research questions

What do you want to know more about? Take time to think about it and write possible questions in a Text Tile by clicking on the A icon.

When ready, share with the group

Use the group controls so that you can see and share each others' notes. See the image below for how to do that. Watch your teacher model how to turn on the shared button. Watch a video.

Publish (see image above) your work to the class

You can choose one member of your group to publish a summary of the group's work, or you may each publish. When you publish, your workspace will appear under the pink "Class Work" tab (left-hand side of CLUE).

Watch your teacher model this.
